description: This table extracts the Patient Location (PLC) event tracking information into Clarity. PLC records record information about where a patient was at a certain time. They contain information about where the patient is, when they arrived there, how they got there, and who put them there.

columns.name: LOCATION_EVNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient location event.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the location event


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Pending


Confirmed


Canceled


Completed

columns.name: CASE_TRACK_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Surgical case tracking event


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PRE_CANCEL_STS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the status of the record before it was canceled


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: STATUS_C_NAME

columns.name: PRIVATE_YN
columns.description:
Flag denoting whether or not the location event is confidential


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: SOURCE_ORC_ID
columns.description: Source Case ID for the patient location

columns.name: SOURCE_ORL_ID
columns.description: Source Log ID for the patient location

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LOCATION_RECORD_ID
columns.description: This item links the patient's update event to the corresponding patient location facility (PLF) record that determines where the patient really is.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: Confirmed time that a location event occurred

columns.name: CANCELED_TIME
columns.description: The time the event record was canceled.

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.description: Completion time for the location event

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: Free text field for entering comments related to the creation of location event

columns.name: EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item will log how the patient location (PLC) event was created.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


System Event


Manually Created


Interface - Untrusted


Interface - Trusted
